title: Conductors - flow of charge during induction

content.question: In the four steps shown in the figure, a neutral conducting sphere is given a negative charge by grounding it in the presence of a positively charged rod. How does charge move during Step <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>?

choices.label: Positive charge flows from ground to the sphere.
Positive charge flows from the sphere to ground.
Negative charge flows from ground to the sphere.
Negative charge flows from the sphere to ground.

content.answer: Negative charge flows from ground to the sphere.
